tag_list: games, roman-nouzareth, nouzareth, nazareth, nouzaret, free-games, boonty, cafe-com
overview:
Romain is a serial entrepreneur who started his career in 1995 as a co-founder of a web agency that was implementing e-business solutions for the biggest French companies.

IconMedialab (NL0009508720), a giant Swedish player, acquired them in 1999 and Romain expanded the company in France for the next 2 years.

From 2001 to 2009, with the same partner and also brother, Romain developed Boonty.com, one of the largest casual game platform in the world. They had offices in New York, Paris, Singapore, Tokyo and Beijing. The company was sold to Nexway in December 2008.

In 2006, they created cafe.com, the first free to play casual game website based on micro-transactions. 2 years later, in 2008, the first Facebook app was released, is_cool, which became an instant success. The company entered the NYSE Euronext market (FR0004060671) in late 2009.

The same year, Romain and his brother Mathieu started FreshPlanet, a social games and apps studio based in New-York but the two founders separated in 2011.

Romain is now working on his new enterprise.
